title: This website
detail: Website to display my profile. You are literally using it right now.

title: Language Recognition
detail: Python program to recognize handwritten scripts and to which language they belong.

title: Recruit.me
detail: Web app to improve resume screening process. Using web scraping relevant info of interviewee's online accounts like GitHub, LinkedIn, codechef, hackerrank etc. will be presented to the interviewer in a intuitive manner

title: SVV Scheduler
detail: An Android app to simplify the exam supervisor allotment process in KJSCE college. It enables users to view and reserve available slots in real time.

title: Open Drive
detail: Online storage for quick backup of files without any complex authentication

title: Loan Risk Predictor
detail: Web app which uses linear regression to determine whether a person will be able to pay his loan or not. Results are stated in probability (0 to 100%) of returning the loan.
